content.text:
# Kingfishr

| genre           = Indie folk
| label           = B-Unique
| associated_acts =
| current_members = *Eddie Keogh
*Eoghan 'McGoo' McGrath
*Eoin 'Fitz' Fitzgibbon
}}
Kingfishr are an Irish indie folk group formed in Limerick in 2022, comprising members Eddie Keogh (vocals, guitar), Eoghan 'McGoo' McGrath (banjo), and Eoin 'Fitz' Fitzgibbon (guitar). Their song "Killeagh" reached Number 1 on the Irish Singles Chart on 2 May 2025, at which stage it had already been certified 4-times Platinum in Ireland.
